Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Irt-Ḥr-r-rw with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding a relief adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg-section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar; the foot section has broken away.
